section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically apply underlining to the contents of the u element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The u element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample illustrates the use of underline formatting to provide emphasis in a marketing blurb, without giving any extra meaning to the underlined phrase.
example.codeblock: Using our patented SuperFast BitSpeed Technology, our product will answer all of your questions only a few nanoseconds after you ask!
